author: Simon Rossington
comment: Disappointed it can't do all-day counting. App stays on constantly while counting. When you return to watch face, counter starts at zero when reopening

author: Bill Ferreira
comment: No need to fumble with your phone to keep count when your running laps on a track.
title: Perfect counter

author: Joseph Hunt
comment: Difficult to swipe away, very small hitbox for exiting. Other then that, great.

author: Ish Laos
comment: Perfect for what I do. Thanks for coming up with this for wear.
title: Simple and great

author: Syl Grant
comment: Perfect solution for counting rows with knitting and crochet.
title: Wonderful

author: Scott Jenson
comment: Nice little counter but it only works on the foreground. If like to count things during the day and as soon as you return to the home screen, the counter resets. It would allow more tours of counting if the count persisted

author: Corey Swain
comment: Just needs a way to subtract and then this would be perfect.
title: Its ok
